title: Leger's Dream
description: An elderly woman, claiming to be a psychic who can read tea leaves and tarot cards visits the hotel with a warning for Annabella about Leger himself and how he is not to be trusted. When Leger has a nightmare about Annabella where he is to blame for her untimely death, he begins to wonder if perhaps he really is bad luck. However, Lily is more concerned with the psychic's behaviour and uncovers a startling truth about her... Can Leger and Lily reveal the woman's true identity before it's too late?
author: Lacey Dearie
